snippet: The on-track accident in New York on Saturday that killed Kevin Ward Jr. was the third serious sprint car crash Stewart had been involved in recently.
abstract: On-track accident at New York raceway that resulted in death of Kevin Ward Jr is third sprint car crash that Tony Stewart has been involved in; he has pulled out of two races, leaving questions about his future in sport of sprint car racing.

byline.contributor: Benjamin Mueller contributed reporting from Canandaigua, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: The on-track accident in New York on Saturday that killed Kevin Ward Jr. was the third serious sprint car crash Stewart had been involved in recently.

headline.main: Accidents Cloud Future for Tony Stewart in Sprint Cars
headline.print_headline: Accidents Cloud Future for Stewart in Sprint Cars
